Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers rallied to beat the Brooklyn Nets 105-100
The lead grew to 13 early on in the fourth, before the Cavaliers slowly chipped away
Post-Match Reflections: Kenny Atkinson admitted that the pressure of keeping the streak going is starting to become a source of motivation for the Cavs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on the second night of a back-to-back
Others: The Cavaliers' season-opening streak was extended to 11-straight wins
